product_title: Blue Star 1 Ton Portable AC (Fuzzy Logic, Copper Condenser, PC12DB)
overview_text:
Stay Cool and Comfortable
Boasting an airflow volume of up to 350CFM, the Blue Star PC12DB 1-ton Portable Air Conditioner is ideal for rooms up to 120Sq.Ft. Hence, you can instantly lower the temperature in your room with this portable air conditioner, which features fast cooling that promises fast and efficient cooling. Hence, when you've been out running errands in the heat, this AC's quick cooling will rejuvenate your body and mind as soon as you step inside.
Sleep Mode
Rest easy with the Sleep mode in this AC, which is designed to provide a comfortable environment while you sleep.
Self-Diagnosis
Unique self-diagnosis that alerts you of a fault in this air conditioner's operation immediately, triggering corrective actions. Hence, be it an irregularity in this system's operation or a potential fault, the technology of this AC ensures an immediate alert.
High-Efficiency Rotary Compressor
Housing a strong high efficiency rotary compressor, this 1-ton AC is built to deliver dependable cooling and durability.
Effective and Efficient Performance
Engineered to consume up to 1404W, this air conditioner ensures cost-effective and energy-efficient cooling, making it a budget-conscious choice for your home.
Remote-Control Operation
This AC’s remote-control operation facilitates easy and convenient mode of operation, which can be controlled form a set distance.
Copper Condenser Coil
Boasting a copper condenser coil, this Blue Star air conditioner maximises heat exchange efficiency, ensuring effective and rapid cooling for your space.
Anti-Dust Filter
This AC comes with an anti-dust filter that adeptly filters out dust, allergens, and airborne contaminants, making the air in your home clean and healthy.
Auto-Restart Function
Experience continuous comfort with this AC's auto-restart function, which ensures uninterrupted cooling in your space. Hence, be it scorching summer afternoons or mellow spring evenings, the auto-restart feature in this AC stands ready to deliver uninterrupted cooling, adapting seamlessly to your changing environmental needs.
R410A Refrigerant
Utilising R410A refrigerant, this air conditioner is engineered to deliver both efficient and environmentally friendly cooling solutions.
key_features: 1 Year Comprehensive Warranty, 5 Years Compressor Warranty
